name: test
query:
SELECT 
    tp.full_name AS "Name",
    tp.mobile_number AS "Mobile",
    COALESCE(SUM(d.ammount), 0) AS "Total Donation (This Month)",
    s.ashraya AS "Ashraya Status",
    COALESCE(s.rounds_chanting, 0) AS "Chanting Rounds"
FROM 
    `tabTemple Profile` tp
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabDonations` d ON tp.name = d.temple_id 
    AND MONTH(d.date) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) 
    AND YEAR(d.date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabSadhna` s ON tp.name = s.temple_id
GROUP BY 
    tp.name;
